lines.text: You have to get up pretty early in the morning to fool Maxine Shaw!
That's because evil never sleeps.

[eyeing Kyle]
But ugly gets plenty of rest!

[to Regine]
Look, you're gonna have a hard time finding "the one." You're a snob from the projects! Believe me, that's rare.
Khadijah, I think I hear something in the other room. I'm scared. Can I sleep in your bed?
Regine, this is a Queens-sized bed. That means it's for the QUEEN.
Synclaire, I try to be there for you, but you take that fork in the road and you lose me every time!
Come on Kyle, be a man!
Max, if I was half the man you are, I might be willing.
Come on Khadijah, do it for our friendship. You can't put a price on that...
Yes I can dear, fifty dollars.

[exiting the elevator]
Ah, so this is the legendary "Flavor."
No, this is the real one.

[after learning that Overton is afraid of clowns]
Overton, if you don't like clowns, why are you hanging with Kyle?
Maxine, I am trying to help a person. You remember people. They're the ones with the torches who chased you out of the castle.

[excited by winning a case]
Do not touch me unless you want to get BURNED!

[after Khadijah accidentally puts Grant Hill in the hospital]
Can you believe it? They wouldn't even let him see his fiancée, the future Regine Hunter-Hill!
Regine, you are an embarrassment to desperate women everywhere.

[as Maxine and Synclaire discover Grant Hill and Khadijah making out in the living room]
I hope you realize that your lips are compromising your journalistic integrity!
Yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, and it's about time! Now, let's go pull Regine's head out of the oven!
